name: Dimension Collapse
description:
Escape a collapsing pocket dimension before it is consumed by the Void!

Point and Click to interact

There's no time limit or any way to fail. The original idea was that the environment would get more and more corrupted as you progress through the game (possibly even making some areas no longer accessible), but there wasn't enough time.

Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49

Music used:
Static Motion by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4414-static-motion
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

With the Sea by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4638-with-the-sea
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
